This is a beautiful watch, I'm really happy with it! I've tried finding a watch like this in local stores, and they just don't exist anymore. The only reason I've knocked a star off is because the gems look very likely to fall off at some point, there isn't anything except glue holding them on, and a couple are glued a tad crooked. Maybe it'll last a few years, maybe it'll last a few months, I'm not sure, it's just a concern.  That aside, again, it's beautiful for the price. It would make a great gift item!. I had to remove two of the links - the video linked in the instructions wasn't very helpful, but I figured it out on my own. Each pin in the links have a tiny slot on one side (like what you'd fit a tiny flat tip screwdriver in), and a rounded tip on the other side. Using the tool that comes with the watch, you put the slotted side against the opening, and the rounded tip against the screw side. Then you just screw in the mechanism until the pin pops out. I was a little nervous doing it, but it worked just fine!  Overall, I recommend this watch, as long as you're not expecting something that will last a super long time.
